## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-13.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-13.5, 23.5) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 21.0) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) - Status: WORKING

### Pipe Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Underground Pipe at position (-9.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Underground Pipe at position (-10.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-5.5, 16.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-9.5, 22.5) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe Group at position (-7.5, 24.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-5.5, 24.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-4.5, 24.5) - Status: EMPTY

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity Group at position (-3.6666666666666665, 20.214285714285715) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
- Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Pipe Placement and Connection
- Ensure that there is no existing object in the way before placing a pipe-to-ground. Check the target location for any obstructions.
- Verify that you have the necessary pipes in your inventory before attempting to place them.
- When connecting underground pipes, ensure that the pipes are aligned and within connection range to avoid connection failures.

### Errors in Electricity Network
- Make sure to connect the electricity group to the electric network to resolve the NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK status.

### General Inventory Management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary ingredients and components for construction and connection tasks.
